wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Logan (17 August 1888 – 21 June 1962) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Falkirk and Chelsea.

response: Alex McLeish, Scotland's most capped defender with 77 caps and national team coach, went to school in Barrhead. In the early 20th century, the town produced three brothers, Alec Logan, James Logan and Tommy Logan who all played for either Scotland or the Scottish League XI.
*Tommy Logan (1888–1960), Scottish footballer (Falkirk FC, Chelsea FC and Scotland)
* Alec Logan, James Logan (brother), Tommy Logan (brother)
